title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles Results
text: March 13, 2018 / 1:23 AM / Updated 9 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Mar 13 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Women's Singles matches on Monday .. 3rd Round .. Qiang Wang (CHN) beat 14-Kristina Mladenovic 6-1 6-2 (FRA) Naomi Osaka (JPN) beat Sachia Vickery (USA) 6-3 6-3 Maria Sakkari (GRE) beat 17-Coco Vandeweghe (USA) 6-2 6-4 21-Anastasija Sevastova beat 12-Julia Goerges (GER) 6-3 6-3 (LAT) Danielle Collins (USA) beat Sofya Zhuk (RUS) 6-4 6-4 7-Caroline Garcia (FRA) beat 26-Daria Gavrilova (AUS) 7-5 6-4 10-Angelique Kerber (GER) beat 24-Elena Vesnina (RUS) 7-5 6-2 20-Daria Kasatkina (RUS) beat 13-Sloane Stephens (USA) 6-4 6-3 2-Caroline Wozniacki (DEN) beat Aliaksandra Sasnovich 6-4 2-6 6-3 (BLR)
